title: Zealot

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sacrificial Ambush: At night, you may kill all your visitors. One charge.
- At night, you may pray. If you are visited by any players, you blackmail them and regenerate your charge of Sacrificial Ambush if you don't have any.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start the game with a target (your spouse). They will be a non-evil player and not have the power subalignment.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Sacrifice your spouse in the name of God.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4768
*"I lifted the corpse in my arms and laid it on the bed. I gazed upon it with delight. Such was the elation of my thoughts, that I even broke into laughter. I clapped my hands and exclaimed, 'It is done! My sacred duty is fulfilled! To that I have sacrificed, O my God! thy last and best gift, my wife!'*
- Charles Brockden Brown, *Wieland; Or the Transformation*
